snippet: The search for the 2015 Knight-Mozilla Fellows is now open, and staffers from The New York Times, Mozilla OpenNews and The Washington Post are seeking two fellows to join their community platform collaboration.
abstract: The search for the 2015 Knight-Mozilla Fellows is now open, and staffers from The New York Times, Mozilla OpenNews and The Washington Post are seeking two fellows to join their community platform collaboration.

headline.main: Build an Open Source Community Platform With New York Times, Washington Post and Mozilla
